attributes.action: Help Uganda find Joseph Kony and save children
attributes.additional_details:
Joseph Kony is the leader of a guerrilla group called the Lord's Resistance Group (LRA).
This group set out to change the way that Uganda is governed, based on the belief that Kony has been told by God that this is his mission.
This group has taken tens of thousands of children from their families and forced them to fight for Kony's cause.
(http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Y4MnpzG5Sqc)
